activities: SJV & Associates is a public records wholesaler operating on behalf of retail background screening agencies.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: SJV & Associates has chosen to utilize the EU data protection authorities and Swiss FDPIC as it's designated independent recourse mechanism to assist in resolving disputes.
